restaurant.gui

Class RestaurantPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • restaurant.gui.RestaurantPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class RestaurantPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Panel in frame that contains all the restaurant information, including host, cook, waiters, and customers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
